name: Hotel Isla Mallorca & Spa

reviews.title: Nice hotel
reviews.text: Junior suite was a great size and well-appointed. Food and drink reasonably priced for a hotel of this quality. Only downside was lack of a balcony. Pleasant, if rather long, walk into centre of Palma. Would definitely stay here again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and I stayed here for a few days recently and had a lovely time. We found the hotel staff to be friendly and helpful and the room was lovely. We didn't use the restaurant or drink at the hotel so not sure what the service was like there.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We got the number 3 bus into Palma a couple of times which cost 1 Euro 50 each, and we also got the bus the other way to the Illeses Beach, which was lovely.
reviews.title: Hotel offering great value in Palma, but lacking staff

reviews.text: We found a nice little bar around the corner (S'UC Cafe Bar), which seemed to be one that the locals used - it cost us 3 Euros for a beer and a wine, which was very good value and the guy serving was great.
reviews.title: Not great service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only downside was that it was cloudy while we were there, so although warm we didn't see much sun.
reviews.title: gem of a hotel

reviews.text: I would recommend this hotel as a really comfortable and pleasant place to stay.
reviews.title: A really pleasant stay and will definitely go back

reviews.text: Our room was an executive suite which was lovely even tho it was the most basic offered. Next time I will go for a patio balcony.
reviews.title: Fabulous
Poor first impression but it did improve
reviews.text: Food lovely with plenty of choice. Bar snacks more than acceptable on quality n price. Same for drinks. Modern contemporary feel throughout hotel and good quality decor n finish.
It was a steady but very enjoyable 15 min stroll to palma main centre but plenty of choice round n about hotel.
reviews.title: Just what a good 4 star hotel should be like

reviews.text: It really was an ideal place to stay.
reviews.title: Great breakfasts, lovely room.

reviews.text: Very modern exterior and interior superb rooms, love the shower with coloured lights and enough room for the whole family... Bit of a walk to centre of town, but lots of restaurants promenade 5 minutes walk, decent neighbourhood.We were pleased and oh yes the breakfast and buffet are spot on not to mention the excellent helpful staff. You won't go wrong here great place to stay whilst visiting Palma...
reviews.title: Modern-Great Staff

reviews.text: Just returned from a weekend a way with a group of friends. What a great hotel. The hotel is beautifully clean and well run. Staff extremely helpful, friendly and polite nothing seems to be too much trouble for them. I have nothing but praise for this place. My only gripe (if I was forcing myself to find one) would be the design of the bathrooms, but that's just personal preference.
reviews.title: A LITTLE GEM

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The outdoor space is equally as clean and attractive as the interor. The pool bar stays open until about 11.30 p.m. (delicious cocktails available) and there is a DJ playing music. Nothing too loud, just good music to sit (or dance to) and while away the evening. Even the food is good here. So if you don't fancy going out one evening have a meal in hotel and chill out at the pool bar afterward. Its all very relaxing. Hey, what's not to like!!!
reviews.title: DO NOT STAY HERE - UNHELPFUL, RUDE STAFF

reviews.text: If you're looking for a weekend city break, value for money and all the above thrown in too, then this is the place too stay.
reviews.title: Great breakfast and good location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Do NOT stay at this hotel. My boyfriend and I both had our iphones stolen from inside our locked, second floor hotel room. We complained to management who said there was nothing that they could do as our phones were not in the safe box (this was because the phones were charging). We insisted the hotel do something about this as the phones had clearly been stolen by someone with a key card to our room. We were then informed that the police were coming which we welcomed as we believed they were trying to help us. As we spoke no English, the manager was translating what the police were saying. We were then told that as we were so upset/ angry that no action was being taken that we were being thrown out of the hotel then and there. We were thrown out of the hotel, and made to feel like criminals, despite the fact that OUR phones had been stolen. We were even forced to pay the bill. Absolutely appalling service. Do NOT STAY HERE. Your valuables are not safe in the rooms, and the staff will not help you if anything goes wrong.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, shame about the wrong information at reception

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We got the room number 808. We love the view, it was amazing. The hotel staff very friendly specially Lenin. The hotel is not in a busy street, so it was very quite, perfect for sleeping after a sightseeing day. One thing was not right in our room, each time the top room was flushing their bathroom, some noise came from the pipes. I enjoyed the Spa!!! Nice hotel.!!!
reviews.title: Quite good.!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Heading to Cala Millor we decided to stay a couple of nights at the Hotel Isla de Mallorca. First I should say that the Hotel is not central and it's situation is back from the Marina area and not easy to make your own way to. We took the EMT Bus from the Airport to Bus Stop 19 on Passeo Mallorca. Cost is 3 Euros each. I would advise that a taxi is used to reach Hotel as it sits high on the hill and the first stage is a climb of 84 steps, not easy with luggage. The taxi took about 5 mins. The Hotel is modern, bright clean and efficient. The staff are pleasant, polite and helpful.Our room was on the first floor, modern, excellent shower and washing facilities. No bath fitted, however since our preference is to shower, that was not a problem. The pool area is OK, but busy. Using the pool later on in the day we found it to be quieter apart from one young man and his family who believed they had the divine right to throw a ball and act like idiots. I would recommend the hotel without any doubt. The walk to Palma Centre is not so far and there is a bus stop for the 24 hour tourist bus a short distance from the Hotel. This is the best way to familiarise yourself with Palma.
reviews.title: Two night stopover

reviews.text: This was a nice hotel to stay in! The staff was very helpful, friendly and quick to help us to rent a car or get a taxi. Maybe the room was a little small, but clean and modernly decorated. And outside a balcony with a view. Nice pool area. Nice spa, but remember to order treatment quickly or else it will be full. Great breakfast buffet and very nice buffet in the evening too. Buses a short walk away,(also the sight seeing bus) and no problem to stroll along the beautiful seaside promenade to town centre. Big supermarked 500 m down the road. Not a hotel to choose if you want a beach holiday. Palma beach is on the other side of town, but easy to reach by bus, though. A great hotel for relaxation and holiday in cosy Palma city.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay

reviews.text: Lovely hotel, we had Junior Suite which had king size bed and sofa bed. No balcony but other to that the room was adequate. Plenty of choice at breakfast, pool side snacks, cocktails etc which was fine. All really helpful staff other than one person (George in pool side area who was a Sales Prevention Officer). Not to be confused with George at reception who was excellent.
reviews.title: Last minute 4 night break.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would definitely return to this hotel.
reviews.title: Definately go back .

aka: Hotel Isla Mallorca Palma De Mallorca
description: Placed in a quiet area next to the Seaside Promenade, a 15 minutes walk from the Old Quarter, Hotel Isla Mallorca & Spa is a modern urban hotel that combines comfort, closeness and excellent customer service. Hotel Isla Mallorca & Spa offers 153 rooms and Junior Suites opened in 2010 and 2005, Spa and Wellness Centre, conference rooms, restaurant and swimming-pool, making it a perfect choice for business trips and holidays in Majorca.
